{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3476286,"name":"","username":"nstrike","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nstrike/{size}/167038_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-09T03:49:38.542Z","cooked":"

Does anyone know where a command based Elevator sim with an exponential profile or maxmotion is? I just wanted something for my students to reference so we can sim every part of our robot this year if possible.

I know WPILib has a great example but this is a bit difficult for my students to transform into a subsystem.

github.com

allwpilib/wpilibjExamples/src/main/java/edu/wpi/first/wpilibj/examples/elevatore...

Official Repository of WPILibJ and WPILibC. Contribute to wpilibsuite/allwpilib development by creating an account on GitHub.

Thanks in advance!
